ModMetaData.name: Pawn Badge Fan Fork [Adopted]
ModMetaData.author: Updated by Ogliss
ModMetaData.description:
An update to Saucy_Pigeon's fan fork of the mod "Pawn Badge" originally by Rangel Reale which allows adding up to two informative badges to the colonist bar.
Fixed issue where other mods calling ResolveReferences on race ThingDefs would remove the Badges Tab. Using same packageId as Saucy_Pigeon's fan fork.
Any badge mods made for the original mod should be compatible with this mod, however patches that rely on the mod name will need updating(id suggest using IfModActive="SaucyPigeon.PawnBadge" in the LoadFolders.xml instead of a PatchOperationFindMod)
Can be safely added and removed from save games.
Requires Harmony (versions 1.1+ only).
Credits: - Saucy_Pigeon, the original author of the Fan Fork. - Rangel Reale, the original author of the mod. - LeninsCat, for fixing the manifest error message and providing excellent updated textures.
